tool_description: Aggregates and consolidates historical weather and power generation data from multiple sources and time periods to create comprehensive datasets for model training.

data_sources.description: List of data source identifiers to aggregate

start_date.description: Start date for historical data aggregation

end_date.description: End date for historical data aggregation

variables.description: Variables to include: wind_speed, wind_direction, temperature, pressure, humidity, power_output

aggregation_method.description: Data aggregation method: mean, median, sum, min, max

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and both must be in the past.
Unknown data source: One or more specified data sources are not available or accessible.
Invalid variable name: Use only supported variables [wind_speed, wind_direction, temperature, pressure, humidity, power_output].
Invalid aggregation method: Use one of [mean, median, sum, min, max].
Data availability insufficient: Requested time period has insufficient data coverage for reliable aggregation.
usage: Specify data sources, date range, and variables to aggregate. Choose aggregation method appropriate for your analysis - mean for typical values, max for extreme event analysis.

aggregated_data.description: Consolidated dataset with requested variables and time resolution

data_coverage.description: Percentage of requested time period with available data

source_contributions.description: Contribution statistics from each data source

quality_metrics.description: Data quality scores for each aggregated variable
